resources.string: Εμφάνιση στη γραμμή κατάστασης και οθόνη κλειδώματος
Κάντε κλικ εδώ για εμφάνιση σημαντικών πληροφοριών
Some profile preferences require ROOT privileges. These preferences are marked with \"(R)\".
For Sony devices, please enable \"Stamina\" mode in \"Power management\". Please also add PhoneProfiles into \"Apps active in standby\". Without this, the application will not work correctly.
Some profile preferences require changes in system Settings. These preferences are marked with \"(S)\".
To enable \"Interruptions type\" profile parameters, allow PhoneProfiles \"Notification access\" in system settings.
\"Interruptions\" in profile \"Ringer mode\" requires enabling PhoneProfiles in \"Notification access\" system settings. Click here and enable PhoneProfiles.
Please grant them in the next dialog. Profile will then be activated.
requires some permissions to be granted.
Please grant them in the next dialog. You can then select wallpaper from the gallery.
Selecting a custom profile icon requires some permissions.
Please grant them in the next dialog. You can then select an icon from the gallery.
Backup of application settings requires some permissions.
Please grant them in next dialog. Settings will then be backed-up.
Restore of application settings requires some permissions.
Please grant them in next dialog. Data will then be restored.
You have not enabled \"Modify system settings\". Never ask again?
Please search for \"PhoneProfiles\" application and enable it.
In Android 6, it is not possible to change the \"Vibrate when ringing\" system setting on non-rooted devices.
In Android 6+, it is not possible to change the level of \"Adaptive brightness\" on non-rooted devices.
ROOT required to change adaptive level.

Android 6+ implements \"Doze mode\" and \"App Standby\". Concerning problems with event profile activation, if you leave the device unplugged and stationary for a period of time with the screen off, click here to add PhoneProfiles into \"Not optimized\".
How \"Unlink ringer and notification volumes\" works:

Profile activation adjusts device volume by the running profile notifications volume level. When call ringing is detected, the ringing volume level from the running profile is adjusted. After the call ends, the notification volume level from the running profile is restored.
Please grant them in next dialog.
Experimental. It may not work on your device
If option \"24 hours\" is not working on your device (LG), use option \"Always On\". Option \"Always On\" may cause problems with Samsung devices. If so, then use option \"24 hours\".
You have selected a ringer/notification tone from the SDCard. Tone cannot be played because this requires some permissions.
Please grant them in next dialog. Tone will then be played.
Playing selected ringer/notification requires some permissions to be granted.
Some profile preferences are interactive. These preferences display system setup screens, and are marked with \"(I)\".
Note: Orange text in this information is clickable. Clicking on this text opens the relevant setup screen.
Please rate this application on Google Play
You have not enabled \"Do not disturb access\". Never ask again?
Please search for \"PhoneProfiles\" application and enable it.
Add PhoneProfiles to \"Not optimized\" if you encounter problems with event profile activation, or if you leave your device unplugged and stationary for a period of time with the screen off.
You can activate a profile through Tasker. Configure task \"System\"/\"Send Intent\" with parameters:
Do you find this application useful?\nSupport its development by sending a donation to the developer.
You have not enabled \"Draw over apps\". Never ask again?
Please search for \"PhoneProfiles\" application and enable it.
This important information can be viewed In Editor through the question mark icon in the toolbar.
unsupported network type or can\'t be changed
Some devices do not support colorful icons in the status bar.
Your device has linked volume levels for ringtone and notifications. You can use \"Unlink ringer and notification volumes\". Click here to configure it.
Your device has linked volumes for ringtone and notifications. If you want unlinked volumes, enable this parameter.
If ringtone volume is set to \"0\", it configures the device for silent mode. Notification volume is ignored.

Ongoing status bar notification is required for PhoneProfilesService to operate properly. With notification, PhoneProfilesService is changed to \"foreground service,\" which is not killed by Android. PhoneProfilesService must run permanently.
Click this to open Application menu, where you can change application Settings.
Click this to add a new profile.
Click this to delete all profiles.
Click this to show Important information. Please read.
Click this to open the profile preferences editor.
Click this to open profile menu with options: Activate, Duplicate and Delete profile.
Drag profile up/down with this handler to change the profile view order in Activator.
Click this to open Editor, where you can configure profiles, change application settings, etc.
Click this to activate a profile.
Click this to save profile preference changes.
Use this if volume link detection is wrong.
Status bar notification is not enabled!
\"Do not disturb\" in profile \"Ringer mode\" requires enabling PhoneProfiles in \"Notification access\" system settings. Click here and enable.
In Android 6: This system setting can be changed only on rooted devices. Affected are ringer modes and do not disturb types with vibration.
Parameter profile_name is missing or empty.
Some profile preferences require permission WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS. ROOT is not required. These preferences are marked with \"(G1)\".
For more information, look at the \"Profiles\" section further below.
Profile parameters marked with (G1) need special permission for PhoneProfiles. This is done through your PC with installed adb.
If you do not have adb installed on your PC:
On your device, go into Settings > About > Software Information and click on Build Number 7 times. This will unlock and display Developer Options in Settings.
Go into Settings > Developer Options and enable USB Debugging.
On your PC, open a Command Prompt (Windows), or Terminal (Linux, OSX). Navigate to the folder where you extracted your adb files, and EXACTLY execute the following command:
After successful execution, all profile parameters marked with (G1) will be enabled.
not enabled Accessibility settings for PhoneProfilesPlusExtender
Click here to check for changes and upgrade PhoneProfilesPlusExtender.
The backed-up database is in a newer version.
This notification uses the media channel. Therefore it uses the media volume.
Download latest version of PhoneProfilesPlusExtender.apk from it\'s GitHub. Then click to notification about downloaded apk and install it.
Thank you for donating.\nI really appreciate it.
In-App Donations are not supported. Is Google Play Store installed correctly?
May not working connection into hotspot from another devices.
Shows permission witch is needed grant it.
Please install the new version of PhoneProfilesPlusExtender. More information about installation is in parameters for which is PhoneProfilesPlusExtender required.
Click here to display PhoneProfilesPlusExtender releases in GitHub.
To enable \"Force stop applications\" parameter, click here to install PhoneProfilesPlusExtender.
New version of PhoneProfilesPlusExtender is required. Click here to upgrade it.
To enable \"Force stop applications\" parameter, allow PhoneProfilesPlusExtender \"Accessibility\" in system settings.
It works only when the screen is on and unlocked.
If you have problems, questions and suggestions, write me an email:
Simulates press of Home button in navigation bar.
Custom icon image is too large. Allowed is max.
Backup files will be saved in device internal storage into folder
Note: Backup files contains sensitive private data. Distribute files to third parties, for example in zip file with password.
Privacy policy is changed. Especially about backup files generated by Backup function.
Click this to show Privacy policy.
Change of adaptive level may not work on your device (example: Samsung devices).
(C) configured in system, (S) returned by scanner.
(C) configured in system, (S) returned by scanner.
Error restoring the shared profile preferences.
Some permissions are not granted. Click here to grant it.
You have not enabled \"Display pop-up window\". Never ask again?
Allow PhoneProfiles to run in the background, add it to not optimized/not monitored applications. Without this, PhoneProfiles will not working in background.
Click here to enable automatic start for PhoneProfiles
Concerning problems with run of PhoneProfiles in background, click here to allow PhoneProfiles to run in the background, add it to not optimized/not monitored applications.
Please grant root for PhoneProfiles. Is required for profile and event parameters, which requires root.
Please grant root for PhoneProfiles. Is required for profile parameters, which requires root.
Please open root manager installed in your device and grant root for PhoneProfiles.
Grant root is not enabled. Click here to grant it.
for change ringtone, notification, alarm sound
for enable/disable mobile data, change mobile network type, connect to SSID
for unlink ringing and notification volumes, enable/disable speakerphone during call
for save backup data into storage
for load backup data from storage
for play ringing and notification sounds
for change sound profile, change ringing, notification, system volume
for enable/disable DTMF tone when dialing
for load custom icons from storage
Your device does not have linked volumes for ringtone and notifications.
Please help me with translation, thank you:
Debug log into log.txt and crash.txt
Please grant them in next dialog. Debug log will then be write.
for write debug log into log.txt and crash.txt
Write debug log into log.txt and crash.txt requires some permissions to be granted.
Εμφανίζει το ενεργό προφίλ με ένδειξη επιλογών. Ανοίγει τον Ενεργοποιητή με το άγγιγμα.
Use icon lightness for custom profile icons
Applications, shortcuts, intents to run it
For lock type \"Use PhoneProfilesPlusExtender\", click here to install PhoneProfilesPlusExtender.
For lock type \"Use PhoneProfilesPlusExtender\", allow PhoneProfilesPlusExtender \"Accessibility\" in system settings.
for enable/disable mobile data, change mobile network type, connect to SSID, enable/disable Bluetooth
Your device has linked volume levels for ringtone and notifications. Click here to configure unlink.
Your device does not have linked volume levels for ringtone and notifications. Click here to configure unlink.
Click here to show information about types of preferences: (G1), (R), (S), (I).
Click here to show more information.
For truly silent notification volume, configure notification tone to \"PhoneProfiles Silent\" or \"None\".
Click here to show how \"Unlink ringer and notification volumes\" works.
Backup and e-mail settings to author
E-mail debug log files to author
You do not have granted permission \"Draw over apps\". But this permission is required for Android 10. Please grant it.
Shows when is running export of PhoneProfiles data into PhoneProfilesPlus.

PhoneProfiles is not more maintained. Only critical bug fixes will be made. If you want, install PhoneProfilesPlus and in Editor menu use function \"Backup/restore\"/\"Import data from PhoneProfiles\"."
PhoneProfiles is not more maintained. Are you sure to not show this notification in future?
